function.name: deviceTemperatureSetting_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the temperature of a specified SmartThings device or its compartment.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to be used to set the temperature on.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature on.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature to be used.
